statement.p: The four sequential sides of a quadrilateral have lengths \displaystyle{a}={5.5}, \displaystyle{b}={7.1}, \displaystyle{c}={8.5}, and \displaystyle{d}={10.3} (all measured in yards). The angle between the two smallest sides is \displaystyle\alpha={96}^\circ.
What is the area of this quadrilateral?
